variable.name: INVSITE
variable.comment: Numeric code identifying the site (for internal use)

variable.name: INV
variable.comment: Numeric code identifying the investigator (for internal use)

variable.name: GP5
variable.description: I am bothered by side effects of treatment
variable.comment: FAMS - ADDITIONAL CONCERNS By selecting one (1) per line, please indicate how true each statement has been for you during the past 7 days.
